## Graphiques

```{r,warning=FALSE}
frequence <- read.csv("~/Desktop/Stage_biomarqueurs/frequence.csv")
head(frequence)
x=seq(0,100,by=5)
y=c()
for(i in 1:length(x)){
  y[i]=length(which(frequence$freq_BM_tumoral>=x[i]))
}
```

```{r}
barplot(y,x)
```
